branchCategory.name: PFMV
branchCategory.description: Answering the demands for a pressure sensor that would send an output over a wide range where most pressure sensors could not send a signal when adsorbing minute work pieces, SMC has designed the PFMV5 series.  The PFMV5 is a small flow sensor with a rapid response time of less than 5ms.  The PFMV5 series is mountable in a space-saving location since the straight piping length is not required. The PFMV3 voltage monitor for the PFMV5 series can cover a full range of sensors (6 ranges). The sensor connector offers easy connection and removal of wiring.   The dual color display (red and green)allows for visual confirmation of the current condition.

branchItem.name: PFMV5, Flow Sensor
branchItem.description: Answering the demands for a pressure sensor that would send an output over a wide range where most pressure sensors could not send a signal when adsorbing minute work pieces, SMC has designed the PFMV5 series.  The PFMV5 is a small flow sensor with a rapid response time of less than 5ms.  The PFMV5 series is mountable in a space-saving location since the straight piping length is not required. The PFMV3 voltage monitor for the PFMV5 series can cover a full range of sensors (6 ranges). The sensor connector offers easy connection and removal of wiring.   The dual color display (red and green)allows for visual confirmation of the current condition.
branchItem.bullets: <UL> <LI>Response speed: 5ms or less <LI>Proof pressure: 500 kPa <LI>Low flow rate range <LI>Output: 1 to 5V analog (non-linear) <LI>Piping specification: M5 female threads <LI>Weight 10g (not including the lead wire)</LI></UL>
